title: Okta FastPass Setup Guide
content:
Okta FastPass allows you to sign in without entering your password. It utilizes Okta Verify installed locally on your laptop (this is separate from the Okta browser plugin). [NOTE] If you setup Okta FastPass, you MUST have a another authentication method. Okta FastPass does not work in all scenarios and only works on the laptop you have installed Okta Verify on . In order to prevent account lockouts, please ensure you have another authentication method setup like Okta Verify (on your phone), Google Authenticator, etc. Before you begin, please make sure you have completed the following prerequisites: Ensure your Okta account is activated and ready for use. . This should be automatically pushed to your machine - if you do not see it installed you will have the option to install the software when you click on the FastPass button. [INFO] The following instructions are for Mac devices. For indications of the user experience for Windows users, please see Okta’s documentation . We are currently investigating the implementation of Windows Hello. Initial Setup (MacOS) Skip to: Video of the full setup process Click on ‘Sign in with Okta FastPass’ button. You may need to click it twice. [Image] 2. Okta Verify on your machine will open up to this screen. Click ‘Add Account’ [Image] Your default web browser will launch and display the Okta login page. Enter your Okta username and click 'Next'. Follow the prompts to sign into your Okta account. After successfully signing in, Okta Verify will open again and prompt you to add your Touch ID with Okta Verify. Follow the on-screen instructions to complete this process. 
[Image] [Image]
 5. Once you have successfully added your Touch ID, you are now ready to use Okta FastPass!
